      • setDeviceName

        public void setDeviceName(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name
        参数:
        name - the name

      • getDeviceName

        public void getDeviceName()
        Get the name

      • sendData

        public boolean sendData(byte[] data)
        Send data
        参数:
        data - the data need to send

      • connect

        public boolean connect(java.lang.String address)
        Connects to the GATT server hosted on the Bluetooth LE device.
        参数:
        address - The device address of the destination device.
        返回:
        Return true if the connection is initiated successfully. The connection result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onConnectionStateChange(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, int, int) callback.

      • close

        public void close()
        When the le services manager close, it must disconnect and close the gatt.

      • refreshDeviceCache

        public boolean refreshDeviceCache(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt mBluetoothGatt)
        Clears the internal cache and forces a refresh of the services from the * remote device.

      • disconnectGatt

        public void disconnectGatt()
        Disconnects an existing connection or cancel a pending connection. The disconnection result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onConnectionStateChange(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, int, int) callback.

      • startFetch

        public static void startFetch(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
